ARABIC: لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You can make use of the sacrificial animals until a specified time, and then their place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: , There are advantages for you in these (cattle) up to a time, then their place is the ancient House for sacrifice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You may derive benefit (from sacrificial animals) until an appointed time. Thereafter their place (of sacrifice) is near the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There are benefits for you in the (sacrificial offerings) of God until the appointed time when you slaughter them as your offering near the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In the cattle are benefits for you up to a fixed time and then they are to be brought to the Free House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In them are benefits for you for an appointed term, and afterwards they are brought for sacrifice to the `Atiq House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You have advantages in them till a fixed time, then their place of sacrifice is the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: There are things therein profitable to you unto a stated term; thereafter their lawful place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therein are benefits for you for an appointed term; and afterward they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You may benefit from the animals for an appointed time. Then they must be sacrificed at the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For you in them are benefits for a term appointed, and thereafter the destination is toward the ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You may benefit from them until a specified time. Then their place of sacrifice is by the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In them ye have benefits for a term appointed: in the end their place of sacrifice is near the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In them (cattle offered for sacrifice) are benefits for you for an appointed term, and afterwards they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House (the Haram - sacred territory of Makkah city).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In them, you have benefits until an appointed time. After their place of sacrifice is at the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In them are benefits for you until a certain time. Then their place is by the Ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:33] You may benefit from them, such as riding on them and carrying your loads on them in a way that does not harm them, until a specified time, the time for its immolation. Thereafter its lawful sacrifice, that is, the site where its immolation becomes due, is by the Ancient House, meaning, the entire [Meccan] Sanctuary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therein) in the cattle (are benefits for you) benefits in riding them and drinking their milk (for an appointed term) until they are garlanded and designated for immolation in the pilgrimage; (and afterward they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House) if this is a lesser pilgrimage, and they are brought for sacrifice to Mina during the greater pilgrimage.
